params.deadline: The deadline timestamp for the job

returns.jobId: The ID of the created job

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

accumulatedFees().notice: Get accumulated fees ready for withdrawal

approveDelivery(uint256).notice: Approve delivery and release funds to freelancer

assignFreelancer(uint256,address).notice: Assign a freelancer to an open job

createJob(uint256,string).notice: Create a new job with escrow deposit

getClientJobs(address).notice: Get all jobs for a client

getFreelancerJobs(address).notice: Get all jobs for a freelancer

getJobForValidation(uint256).notice: Get minimal job info for validation (gas-efficient)

minBudget().notice: Get the minimum budget for a job

raiseDispute(uint256).notice: Raise a dispute on a job

requestRevision(uint256,string).notice: Request a revision on submitted deliverable

submitDeliverable(uint256,string).notice: Submit a deliverable for a job

totalJobs().notice: Get total number of jobs created

withdrawFees().notice: Withdraw accumulated fees to treasury (owner only)
